PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08152012-06-19,  ,  TBS,  ,  , 
ActPension Benefits Division Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pension Benefits Division Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PENSION BENEFITS DIVISION REGULATIONS in order to ensure that the calculation of the amounts payable under a transfer agreement takes into account a situation where there has been a payment made out of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Pension Plan under the Pension Benefits Division Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0132 Publication Date: 2012-07-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Pension Benefits Division Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the PENSION BENEFITS DIVISION REGULATIONS in order to ensure that the calculation of the amounts payable under a transfer agreement takes into account a situation where there has been a payment made out of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police Pension Plan under the Pension Benefits Division Act.
